The video titled: Kobe Bryant Daughter Gianna Bryant Final Hours" was published one day after Kobe Bryant and Gianna's death in a helicopter crash on January 26, 2020, as reported by AFP.
The video had been viewed more than 700: 000 times on YouTube before it was removed.
Multiple other videos of the same scene: shot from slightly different angles, were viewed tens of thousands of times on YouTube and Facebook.
A longer version of the video: titled "Ariana's Honor Walk," was found, uploaded to YouTube on September 4, 2019, with a caption explaining that it was about a 28-year-old woman named Ariana who was declared brain dead following a car crash in Downey, California, in August 2019.
